TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateDefinition extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: 提供设计时在 Web 服务器控件中定义模板元素的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个基本模板定义类，可从继承和扩展控件设计器中提供设计宿主中的模板化控件的支持，如使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class provides a base template definition class that can be inherited from and extended for a control designer to use in providing support for templated controls in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 设计宿主使用的属性和方法的类以方便在创建和设计时编辑一个模板。A design host uses the properties and methods of the class to facilitate creating and editing a template at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从自定义类，派生类。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a custom class from the class. 此控件设计器支持具有四个可能的模板的控件。This control designer supports a control with four possible templates. 若要试用它，添加对 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用、 编译代码，然后，在设计宿主如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，看一看在设计视图中的页。To try it, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], look at the page in Design view. 选择的控件，单击操作列表来选择要修改的模板，然后使用拖放功能将控件移动到模板。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]
